Chamaleon/Darkfate.

Dakfate arrived and said to Kit kat"I pressume that you're Kitkat"and 
after that he added "We find out what's going here.. by the way don't 
turn on the automatic guns... several of you arent register and auto-
guns can hurt you"

Darkfate opened his comm link to chamaleon, letting all bots around 
know what was going on there "Chamaleon... Report"

"Well sir," said a scared voice that belonged Chamaleon, who was 
running for his life "I'm following by a mad, angry and Betrayed 
bot... that his beast bot is a bull... HE WANT'S KILLL ME 
SSSSIIIIIIIIRRRRR!!!!!!!!!! "

"Well" said Darkfate to the other Preds "We will need a bullfighter 
or something like that... before he kills Chameleon"


"If you don't mind it sir," added Chameleon voice "HELLLLLLPPPPP 
MEEEEEEE!!!!!!!"

Darkfate located where Chameleon was, "To all troops" said the 
dragon "We have a trouble in quarters section, be ready to all... I 
see you there"

Darkfate ran towards quarter's section while Chameleon continued 
running looking for a place ot hide.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> KitKat ran at him.
> "Why would you think I was dead? I just saw you a few minutes ago. 
And I
> already told you that I lead the Pack now. Anyway we'll sort it out
> later. There is an intruder."
> He gattaling gun appeared.
> "Lets go Killfest."
